attributes.action: request that Masterfoods change the ingredients of their products, specifically using rennet not derived from animal products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask and request that Masterfoods change the ingredients of their products, specifically using rennet NOT derived from animal products so that the whey they use, and in turn the various products from Masterfoods are able to bear a Vegetarian symbol. At a time when more and more consumers are concerned about the provenance of their food, Masterfoods' decision to use non-vegetarian whey is a backward step.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
